title.rendered: CONGRATULATION SITE MANAGEMENT TEAM OF N0.8 – BW THOI HOA PROJECT

content.rendered:
After months of hard work on construction site, the Site Management Team has successfully accomplished the No.8 – BW Thoi Hoa project within hand-over schedule.

The Site Management Team started this project at the end of December, 2020. This project has a total area of over 87,000 sqm, including four warehouses of 16,800 sqm each and one warehouse of 20,000 sqm.

During 8 months of construction, the Site Management Team has met all strict standards from the Client. The quality of all items such as structural works, finishing, MEP, utility, landscaping and superflat floors were highly appreciated both technically and aesthetically.

After being put into operation, the No.8 – BW Thoi Hoa Project will contribute to the development of industrial real estate sector of Binh Duong Province in particular and of the whole country in general.

Let’s take a look back at this project’s construction milestones with Newtecons Site Management Team.
